thread.title: Rebecca Fuller
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Rebecca Fuller

author: Rebecca Fuller
title: Rebecca Fuller
text: This site is so user friendly and had exactly the size and color of the prom dress my daughter wanted.The dress was shipped and we received within the time frame that we specified when ordering. When we received the dress it was exactly what my daughter wanted! Will definitely use this site again!
